description: Validation set for AI Leadership Insight Agent — Adobe Inc. sample data

questions.question: What is our current revenue trend?
questions.notes: Should produce a line chart showing quarterly revenue from Q1-Q4 2024. Should highlight accelerating QoQ growth and 23% YoY growth.

questions.question: Which departments are underperforming?
questions.notes: Should identify Marketing (72% of MQL target), Customer Support (68% CSAT, down from 82%), and HR (23% turnover vs 15% target). Should contrast with strong performers: Engineering (94% delivery), Sales (112% quota), Operations (91% efficiency).

questions.question: What were the key risks highlighted in the last quarter?
questions.notes: Should identify: (1) Client concentration — 35% revenue from top 3, (2) Cybersecurity — OAuth vulnerability, (3) Supply chain delays — 18 customers impacted, (4) Regulatory — EU DSA deadline accelerated, (5) Talent retention — 24.8% annualized turnover.

evaluation_criteria.relevance: Answer addresses the question using data from the source documents
evaluation_criteria.accuracy: Specific numbers and facts match the source documents
evaluation_criteria.completeness: All major relevant points are covered
evaluation_criteria.source_citation: Sources are properly cited with document names
evaluation_criteria.actionability: Insights are framed for leadership decision-making
